summary: All four requirements (REQ-48, REQ-49, REQ-50, REQ-51) have been successfully implemented. The diff shows a new LoginButton component that triggers Internet Identity authentication, an updated AccessDeniedScreen with streamlined user-friendly messaging, a new UserMenu component displaying user identity and logout option, and integration of both components into the App.tsx header to show persistent login state.

hallucinated_features.description: Profile and Admin Dashboard menu items in UserMenu dropdown
hallucinated_features.reason: The UserMenu component includes disabled menu items for 'Profile' and 'Admin Dashboard' which were not requested in the BuildRequest. The requirements only specified showing identity information and logout functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: User avatar display with profile image fallback
hallucinated_features.reason: The UserMenu implements avatar functionality with profile image loading and initials fallback, which goes beyond the requirement to simply display identity information or a user menu.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile name fetching and display
hallucinated_features.reason: The UserMenu fetches and displays the user's profile name using useGetCallerUserProfile hook, which was not specified in the requirements. REQ-50 only required displaying identity information.
